casebody.data:
SEJASMI INDUSTRIES, INC., Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellee,
v.
A+ MOLD, INC., doing business as Takumi Manufacturing Company, Defendant/Cross-Defendant,
and
Quality Cavity, Inc., Defendant/Counterplaintiff/Cross-Plaintiff/Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellant,
and
NKL Manufacturing, Inc., Third-Party Defendant. SC: 156341
COA: 336205 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 20, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of the American Mold Builders Association et al. to file a brief amicus curiae in support of the motion for reconsideration is GRANTED. The amicus brief submitted on January 11, 2019, is accepted for filing.
